default.shortDescription: Sympraxis works with organizations of all sizes and across all industries to help improve collaboration and communication with Microsoft 365, SharePoint, and Azure. Let us help you work better, together.
featuredParagraphs:
Learning Pathways is a customizable, on-demand learning solution in Microsoft 365. Sympraxis supports our clients by assisting them with their Learning Pathways implementation focusing on extending learning pathways with custom playlists, creating and adding assets, and focusing on structuring the content to best support the end users. Sympraxis leverages Learning Pathways to:
  • Centralized location for all training content
  • Raise the technical literacy of an organization
  • Document custom solutions
  • Surface training in context to support end users ability to access the right information, in the right place, at the right time
  • Document an organization’s governance plan

callToAction.title: Contact us
callToAction.description: Accelerate your success with Microsoft 365, guided by our passionate team of experts
